meanings.definition: The physical qualities and skills that are characteristic of athletes.
meanings.sent1: His athleticisms were evident in his speed and agility on the field.
meanings.sent2: She admired the athleticisms of the gymnasts performing flips and twists.
meanings.sent3: The dog's athleticisms were on full display as it chased after the frisbee.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful athleticisms in dance were like poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The coach focused on improving the team's athleticisms through rigorous training.

meanings.definition: The practice of engaging in physical activities or sports.
meanings.sent1: Participating in various athleticisms helped him stay fit and healthy.
meanings.sent2: The school promoted different athleticisms to encourage student involvement.
meanings.sent3: His favorite athleticisms included running, swimming, and playing basketball.
meanings.sent4: Engaging in athleticisms regularly can improve overall well-being.
meanings.sent5: The community center offered a range of athleticisms for people of all ages to enjoy.
